question: It shows the different stages in the production of woolen goods.
text: The diagram illustrates the production of woollen goods in its process. It at least goes through 10 stages before wearing  a jacket, a sweater and so on.
Overall, There are 4 different kinds of that fur could end up in either string and get recycled, carpets, jackets, and it could be knitting substances.

To begin with, fleece originally comes from animals and the most used one is the mohair of sheep. It is hard to believe that the fancy wardrobe people wear today come from dirty and disgusting animals but then they, the workers, clean them up and dry them.

lastly, There is a lot of effort and money put into this industry because every single person in this world wears regalia and 60% of people buy new attire every year. So it is not surprising to see a lot of people working on providing garb and cashmere in general.
